    Projects

    Modular Robots

    1 minute read

    A system of physically linking modules capable of forming self-reconfigurable structures

    Trotbot

    less than 1 minute read

    An autonomous delivery robot (and a mobile ground robotics research platform) built for indoor environments

    Swarmbots

    less than 1 minute read

    Automation of a swarm of decentralized mobile robots that perform tasks through swarm intelligence algorithms

    Visual-Inertial SLAM for AUVs

    less than 1 minute read

    Improving VIO/SLAM for underwater robots through transmission-based image enhancement

    Multispectral Image Registration

    less than 1 minute read

    Alignment of drone images taken from multiple spectral cameras for precision agriculture applications

    Robot Localization using Object Tracking

    less than 1 minute read

    Obtaining a localization prior by tracking ‘Objects of Interest’ in a depth map

    LED Globe

    less than 1 minute read

    A large rotating arc lined with LEDs tht displays an image mid-air like a hologram

    Automatic Signature Verification

    less than 1 minute read

    A Siamese Neural Network for distinguishing between authentic & forged signatures
